short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay online all the time at Naresuan University

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The NU-NET Auto Authentication Chrome extension is designed to be used by members of Naresuan University in Phitsanulok, Thailand. Use your staff or student username and password to keep your laptop or desktop computer logged into NU-NET at all times.
